post.body: Uhh yeah it's THAT cold. LOL..for us anyway!
No kidding! It's freaking FREEZING.
It is, in a masochistic kinda way :D It's worth it for when he does drop in.
What the hell is up with that? Who said he could have a life outside of twitter. He just keeps us waiting day in and day out! :P
he hasn't been around since Monday! Where is that man!?
I believe it. Must be awesome to have such a tight family :)
Okay except the 70 cousins part..damn that's a lot of cousins. Do you remember all of their names or do you all wear nametags
Wow..that's kinda gross..but intriguing at the same time.
I remembered that much, actually. But do you do any of the touristy stuff or just hang out?
lol
So are you just visiting family or seeing sights? You have probably seen them all, but do you still do any touristy stuff?
Darn! Well..good for you though :)
LOL...well I would hope for two, but I set my sights LOW!
I don't :) Usually when we go we WANT to be off the strip. We usually do family stuff. I plan to get to PARTY one night in May tho
My sister? In Vegas :) Wayyy off the strip though.
I will be there right after Christmas. Will you still be gone?
No, no. My family was telling me, though :)
I love your mobile pics :) Very fun to browse through.
I mean yay for him! Lol
damn! He beat me. Lol
what a beautiful picture
oh shut up! Lol thanks for the support! Goober!
yeah we are here now!
he got 6 on his first one
my son is a character for sure. Such a cheese ball he is
thanks! I am playing against my husband my son and my sister with a bad foot. Odds are in my favor since my hubby is clumsier
good! I'm tired! 11 hour car drive to vegas that should have been 6 hours! Going to sleep now! Xmas was great! How are you?
lol! I love your Mii!
I babble sometimes. Too much. Especially when I am sleepy. Shutting down now.
Alright I need to hit the sack. Soooo sleepy!! Sweet dreams my tweeps.
Aw man phone is dying. Are ya all later! Smooches
http://twitpic.com/ximy Logan bowled a 74 and I bowled a 97. Hubby bowled 92 and my sister bowled 74
http://twitpic.com/xihy Mommy and Logan feet
http://twitpic.com/xi9i Here he goes! First time bowling!
http://twitpic.com/xhzk Waiting to bowl. Very impatiently
This is a huge bowling alley. We are waiting for a lane. We will have bumpers for the 4 year old but not for the big people
Going bowling for the first time in years. Did I mention I am clumsy? Maybe not a good idea.....
http://twitpic.com/x3wq Found a giant candy cane at the candy factory
Rock band is so awesome! But now my throat hurts! I am now the lead singer of the bad 941!!
Eleven hour drive to Vegas! My neck and shoulders are one solid knot! Ugh.
